mapper.select: select question_id from question where user_id=#{question.user_id} and user_name=#{question.user_name} and question_description=#{question.question_description} and question_detail=#{question.question_detail}
select picture from question_picture where question_id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into question(question_id,user_id,user_name,question_description,question_detail,question_tags) values (#{id},#{question.user_id},#{question.user_name},#{question.question_description}, #{question.question_detail},#{question.question_tags}) on duplicate key update user_id=(user_id), user_name=(user_name), question_description=(question_description), question_detail = (question_detail), question_tags=(question_tags)

insert into comment(comment_id,user_id,user_name,comment_detail,question_id) values (#{comment.comment_id},#{comment.user_id},#{comment.user_name},#{comment.comment_detail}, #{comment.question_id}) on duplicate key update comment_id=(comment_id), user_name=(user_name), comment_detail=(comment_detail), question_id = (question_id)
mapper.update: update question set number_comment=number_comment+1 where question_id =#{id}
